name: Funktionell
tagline: The Power of Imagination Makes Us Infinite
description:
Funk is a Mexico City based technology company. We create custom-made software, hardware, VR and AR. We focus on custom development because it’s the only way to deliver a complete and integrated solution that will fulfill your specific needs. We love designing and building technology from scratch. This is how true innovation is born. 
We are the perfect nearshore development firm your company needs. Get in touch with us!

locations.address: Calle J. Enrique Pestalozzi 231 Narvarte Poniente
